sections.heading: Acquisition of land by city; extent and notice of city jurisdiction9-401
sections.text: Acquisition of land by city; extent and notice of city jurisdictionA. A city or town may purchase, lease or rent land, whether contiguous or noncontiguous, lying outside its corporate limits, for its purposes and uses, and any
